name: datacap-utils-toolkit
author: IBM
description: Datacap Utils Toolkit is a collection of re-usable artifacts useful for integration with IBM Datacap REST services from IBM Business Automation Workflow.

scripts.generatejsdoc: rimraf docs && copyfiles -a assets/* assets/ && jsdoc . -r -c ./jsdoc-conf.json -d docs -R ./README.md && rimraf assets/assets
